text: karune kahyum, ke a badhum mane mari potani bud'dhina karane apavamam avyum che, sum tene atyara sudhi khabara nathi ke allaha ta'ala'e a pahela ghani vastina lokone nasta kari didha, je'o ana karata vadhare saktisali ane ghana dhanavana hatam ane aparadhi'o sathe temana aparadha vise puchatacha ava samaye karavamam nathi avati
